page.title: 06ASKEW HILL FARM QUERNMORE 2
page.content: Farming is much easier nowadays and they have more free time now they have modern machinery. Before, when they used horses, it took them about 2 months to haytime, these days it takes about 2 weeks. From being a stock rearing and milk producing farm,they have turned to rearing sheep and beef.They have had to change many of their buildings,which meant it cost a lot of money.When the milk quota was announced it never changed their farm. Their busiest time is when the sheep are lambing and when they are haytiming.When the lambs are fat and heavy they are taken to the auction to be sold for meat.This summer has been the wettest for many years and they haven't been able to get in all the hay which is a very serious matter.
